assignTheme.content: Can greet people, ask how they are and react to news
assignTheme.heading: Reading

assignTheme.content: Can understand basic common classroom instructions and basic questions about personal details
assignTheme.heading: Listening

assignTheme.content: Can give very limited personal information using basic fixed expressions
assignTheme.heading: Speaking

assignTheme.content: Can copy short sentences on everyday subjects (e.g. directions how to get somewhere)
assignTheme.heading: Writing

assignTheme.content: Can use words like hi, liittle, buy, today and goodbye
assignTheme.heading: Vocabulary

assignTheme.content: Can recognise basic plural forms of nouns.
assignTheme.heading: Reading

assignTheme.content: Can use the subject personal pronoun with ‘be’
assignTheme.heading: Grammar
